name: R5-LinkageType-R4-LinkageType
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 LinkageType into a FHIR R4 LinkageType

element.display: The resource represents an alternative view of the underlying event/condition/etc.  The resource may still be actively maintained, even though it is not considered to be the source of truth.

target.display: The resource represents an alternative view of the underlying event/condition/etc.  The resource may still be actively maintained, even though it is not considered to be the source of truth.

element.display: The resource represents an obsolete record of the underlying event/condition/etc.  It is not expected to be actively maintained.

target.display: The resource represents an obsolete record of the underlying event/condition/etc.  It is not expected to be actively maintained.

element.display: The resource represents the "source of truth" (from the perspective of this Linkage resource) for the underlying event/condition/etc.

target.display: The resource represents the "source of truth" (from the perspective of this Linkage resource) for the underlying event/condition/etc.
